text:
hat is (are) High Blood Cholesterol ?,"A lipoprotein profile will also show the level of triglycerides in your blood. A desirable level is less than 150mg/dL. If the triglycerides in your blood are borderline high (150-199 mg/dL), or high (200 mg/dL or more), you may need treatment.",NIHSeniorHealth,High Blood Cholesterol
What is (are) High Blood Cholesterol ?,"Your LDL goal is how low your LDL cholesterol level should be to reduce your risk of developing heart disease or having a heart attack.
